extendedInfo.description: Listen to the world with euronews radio!Europeâs leading international news channel is now available as a free radio station! Whenever your eyes are busy, when watching the news on screen is not an option, you can always listen to euronews radio. Yet another way to keep informed on whatâs going on in the world.With a newscast at least every half hour (every 15 minutes from 6 to 10 am CET), youâll never have to wait to find what youâre looking for. euronews radio brings you the latest in  world news, sports, business and European affairs, weather and live breaking news as it happens.euronews complements core news services with a range of topical lifestyle programming, including technology, the arts and entertainment.But euronews radio is not only about news, itâs also about music! Discover an exclusive music line-up carefully selected by euronews, standing out from the mainstream radio hits.  Our playlist features artists and talents from all over the world,  with a particularly European flavour.  euronews radio is one of the most user-friendly radio app. It allows immediate access to the world in multiple services: English, Spanish, French, German, Italian and Russian. TV, Smart TV, Internet, Mobile, Radio, Tablets, Hotels, In-flight, cruise shipsâ¦ euronews, the international news hub to access world news from every corner of the globe. With euronews find the right content, at the right place, at the right time.

reviews.comment: Sweet, a bit less biased than others .
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Gives unbalanced view of the world
reviews.comment: Rubbish content. Spent the weekend listening to them going on ad nauseam about the Belgian monarchy and today the British monarchy while the rest of the world barely gets a look in at the end of the program. And it had such potential.
reviews.author: Djeg Moyn

reviews.title: Love it but...
reviews.comment: I love this application, the content is great and the possibility of switching language is a good opportunity to make some practice with Italian and French too :) There is an annoyance though, on my Nexus 7, the streaming constantly interrupts even with a good and reliable Internet connection and also when I turn off the screen (not the machine)...
reviews.author: Suomi Frigorifero

reviews.title: Nestor, Los Angeles
reviews.comment: This App is utterly awesome, on Sprint 3G and runs smoothly. Just an easy way to listening radio on your Android. Only issue is that you can\'t change the language after installing, I chose German but can\'t switch, I\'m learning German so its ok. Download this if your a News Junky, into other perspectives or learning another language. :)
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Bravo!
reviews.comment: I have enjoyed Euronews for over 10 years. This app is great so you can hear the telecast over your phone/tablet.
reviews.author: Ato \303\202ge

reviews.title: Trouble on an S2
reviews.comment: Sometimes locks up and has to be force stopped. Contains full screen ads that sometimes compounds the lockups and makes them worse by blanking out the screen. If not for those problems it may be a usable app.
reviews.author: Jeff Lann

reviews.title: Wouldn\'t work
reviews.comment: Samsung epic Error upon opening. Force closed. Never got to use it
reviews.author: Teri M

reviews.title: C\'est A+
reviews.comment: This is a great application. It is excellent to hear this Eurocentric news service.
reviews.author: A Google User
